name: Kain Van Eck Prototypes
description:
These are my game prototypes for experimental game design. 

The First Game is a season changing platformer. 

The 2nd Game is a space themed endless runner based on the minimalist design principle. 

The third is a racing game where you race around a course

The last one is a voice controlled puzzle game where you have to move your character through the level and get to the end
